h2_title: Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide
content: This fight has two phases, so be prepared for a tough battle and think about how you manage your Gourd and Spell usage throughout. You'll want to take in medicines that include Body-Warming and Body-Cooling Powder, as well as those that strengthen your attacks such as Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets and Loong Aura Amplification Pellets. You might prefer other medicines depending on the build you're ing with, such as the Mirage or Life-Saving Pill.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This fight has two phases, so be prepared for a tough battle and think about how you manage your Gourd and Spell usage throughout. You'll want to take in medicines that include Body-Warming and Body-Cooling Powder, as well as those that strengthen your attacks such as Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets and Loong Aura Amplification Pellets. You might prefer other medicines depending on the build you're ing with, such as the Mirage or Life-Saving Pill.
